author: Odeinoichus
title: A trip to the beach is memorable.
review:
Set #71020 Vacation Alfred: Rounding out the Vacation costumes is Alfred, dressed in a fashionably questionable swimsuit of the past, almost looking like a LEGO City crook going swimming with his black and white striped body suit. As with the others he has dual-moulded arms and legs and is carrying a wine glass with cherry inside. Perhaps a fruity beverage or something stronger, let your imagination decide.

The white collar he has around his neck might not actually be a bow tie, I mentioned the oddness in my last Alfred review, but it's possible this is meant to represent a different type of accessory. A collar that is seen on most suit jackets and shirts. Alfred is smiling and has his bald-cap on of course, definitely an interesting look for the character.

I recommend him to complete the Vacation sub-set of Minifigures, however I would recommend getting more of the others first. If you want to make a plethora of LEGO City crooks in swim trunks, the skin tones might not match, but the parts are definitely worth tracking down. Recommended.
